metadata.title: CVE-2019-20386 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in button_open in login/logind-button.c in systemdbefore 243. When executing the udevadm trigger command, a memory leak mayoccur.

criterions.comment: systemd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
systemd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
